entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is trying to help Katie. He is described as shouting at others and sprinting towards the school.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: A person who has been affected by something, causing her to thrash and scream. She is unable to recognize anyone around her.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry who is described as wearing a shaggy beaverskin coat and having sleet trapped in his eyebrows and beard.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Someone Hagrid has been visiting, described as 'comin' on so well'.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to help Katie who has been affected by something.
Hagrid has been visiting Grawp, someone he seems to be proud of.
